content.rendered:
• Home
  • India
  • Pilgrimage Tour Packages

Pilgrimage Tour Packages

Pilgrimages in India make up a vital part of the spirituality and religious beliefs of the people of this colorful sub-continent.Read More

The ancient land of India has been walked on by the gods themselves along with prominent spiritual teachers, priests, sages, and philosophers in search of inner quests. Ever since the beginning of time these walks and trails across the Indian landmass have gained a lot of importance among the people who go on this quest for truth or the meaning of life from various parts of the world, especially if you are a deeply religious individual.

When it comes to pilgrimages, India is a hub. It is one unique nation that is bound together with a strong sense of oneness and brotherhood. Every step you take here you shall be greeted with one holy shrine or the other. Taking a holy journey is a part and parcel of what being a real Indian truly means. These pilgrims’ trails crisscross the entire nation and there is no dearth of holy Yatras to take. From the Char Dham Yatra of all India to Badrinath, Rameshwaram, Dwarkadheesh, and Jagannath Mandir and the Chota Char Dham Yatra to Kedarnath, Badrinath, Gangotri, and Yamunotri to the holy Shiva pilgrimage of 12 Jyotirlinga to the pilgrimage of the holy cities like Varanasi, Allahabad, Rishikesh, Haridwar and much more.

We bring you incredible packages to meet your pilgrimage requirements. No matter what time of the year you choose to take this holy journey we have highly customizable packages available that too at the most unbelievably low price. Pay a soulful homage to Mata Vaishno Devi, get doused with spiritual vibes on your pilgrimage to Tirupati Balaji, or feel the power of the goddess herself and welcome goodwill in your life and family by taking the pilgrimage for 52 Shaktipeeth. What used to be a far-fetched dream for most, of visiting the iconic cave of Lord Shiva and Parvati i.e. amaranth Yatra of Jammu can now be done with extreme ease but with overwhelming peace and serenity.

Being the land where once the great religious dharma teacher, Gautam Buddha had traveled extensively, attained enlightenment, and set forth the wheel of Dhamma, Buddhist pilgrimage packages to the important places related to him are also made available. We have also made sure to cover the iconic monasteries of Tawang, Sanchi Stupa, and many more.

The best part is you can reset the package according to your liking, convenience, and budget. Handcrafted with care and designed by our efficient travel experts each pilgrimage tour package, no matter which one you choose will bring you immense joy, love, and happiness. A great option for your family, friends, and loved ones to experience a holiday filled with incredible spiritualism and a feeling that will rejuvenate or refresh your soul. No matter where you are traveling from, within or from Abroad, we understand your travel needs and create a lifetime’s worth of memories and maybe even keep coming back for more!

FAQs for Pilgrimage Tours Packages

Q1: What Are Pilgrimage Tour Packages?

A. Pilgrimage tour packages are curated travel itineraries specifically designed for individuals or groups seeking to visit religious or sacred sites, offering a structured journey to explore various pilgrimage destinations.

Q2: What Destinations Are Typically Covered In Pilgrimage Tour Packages?

A. These packages often include revered religious sites such as temples, mosques, churches, shrines, and other holy places based on the specific religious preferences or interests of the travellers.

Q3: Are Pilgrimage Tour Packages Suitable For People Of All Faiths?

A. Yes, these packages cater to individuals of diverse religious beliefs and are designed to accommodate different faiths, providing opportunities for spiritual exploration and cultural immersion.

Q4: What Services Are Usually Included In These Packages?

A. Pilgrimage tour packages commonly include accommodations, transportation, guided tours, visits to religious sites, meals, and sometimes additional activities such as spiritual ceremonies or rituals.

Q5: How Long Do Pilgrimage Tour Packages Typically Last?

A. The duration can vary significantly based on the itinerary and the number of destinations included, ranging from a few days to several weeks, allowing travellers to customize their pilgrimage experience according to their availability and preferences.

Q6: Are These Tours Led By Knowledgeable Guides?

A. Yes, most Pilgrimage Tour Packages provide experienced guides who offer insights into the historical, cultural, and religious significance of the sites visited, enriching the overall journey.

Q7: Can These Packages Accommodate Special Requirements Or Needs?

A. Many tour operators offer options to accommodate dietary restrictions, mobility issues, or other specific requirements. It's advisable to inform the tour operator about any special needs during the booking process.

Q8: How Can One Book A Pilgrimage Tour Package?

A. These packages can be booked through travel agencies, tour operators, or online platforms specializing in religious or spiritual tourism. Booking can typically be done in advance to secure preferred dates.

Q9: Are Pilgrimage Tour Packages Expensive?

A. The cost varies based on factors such as the destinations covered, duration, accommodation standards, and included services. There are options available to suit different budgets.

Q10: Are These Tours Only About Religious Activities?

A. While the primary focus is on visiting religious sites, Pilgrimage Tour Packages often incorporate opportunities to explore the local culture, history, and traditions of the regions visited, offering a holistic travel experience beyond just religious activities.
